channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CO
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CO

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE WAS LOADED ON THE FLOOR. A NEAR BY PACKAGE FELL ON TOP AND CAUSE THE WALLS OF THE BOX TO BURST AND THE NECK OF THE CONTAINERS CRUSHED DescribePack: THE LID BECAME LOOSE AND THE SPILL WENT INTO THE FIBERBOARD CONTAINER. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS ISOLATED AND THE AREA WAS WELL VENTED.

  • Description: During off loading the warehouse crew accidentally put a forklift fork into one of the 50 pound poly bags of phycomycin (un3378) releasing 4 pounds of product. Contractors were dispatched for the containment and cleanup of the release.

item.title: Report X-2023061665

Report X-2023061665

  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found leaking when being loaded onto the vans during preload. Package was brought to QA or inspection. Upon inspection contents were found with loose caps. DescribePack: Loose caps DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed into a damage tote with plastic liner and orientation arrows being followed.

item.title: Report X-2023061646
item.description:
Report X-2023061646

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-24T15:13:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-23
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Leaking package discovered during sortation. Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA. DescribePack: Metal paint cans with plastic lid-retainer rings in oversized carton packed loosely with paper filler. One can fell over inside carton and lid ring came off. Lid opened and spilled contents, soiling other cans and damaging carton. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA.

item.title: Report X-2023061645
item.description:
Report X-2023061645

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-24T15:13:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-23
  • City: JOHNSTOWN
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023061645 SequenceEvent: Package was found in a red hazmat tote in the hazmat damage area wet and leaking. Found that two of the jugs had a loose cap. DescribePack: The caps on two of the jugs were loose. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was placed upright in a red hazmat tote. 2. X-2023061647 SequenceEvent: Package was found in a red hazmat tote in the hazmat damage area wet and leaking. Found that two of the jugs had a loose cap and on was dented on the side of the closure. DescribePack: The caps on two of the jugs were loose. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was placed upright in a red hazmat tote.

item.title: Report X-2023061642
item.description:
Report X-2023061642

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-24T15:13:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-23
  • City: DENVER
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE ARRIVED TO VANLINES WET BECAUSE OF INTERNAL LEAKAGE DescribePack: CAN DENTED ENOUGH WHICH CAUSE LID TO LOOSEN DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE HANDLER DISCOVERED PACKAGE LEAKING AND PUT BAG AND TOTE, THEN INFORMED MANAGER. QA IMFORMED AND SEARCHED FOR SDS. SPILLAGE CLEAN UP WITH GLOVES AND PAPER TOWELS THEN PUT INTO TOTE WITH ALL COMTAMINATED MATERIALS USED FOR CLEAN UP.

item.title: Report E-2023070050

Report E-2023070050

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-05
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the load had shifted during transit and that the one 1700 pound battery(un2794) had been damaged by a sharp object and had released 2 gallons of product. Contractors were dispatched for the containment and cleanup of the release.

item.title: Report E-2023070037
item.description:
Report E-2023070037

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-22T00:38:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-21
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: VEOLIA ES TECHNICAL SOLUTIONS, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: While unloading the contents of the tank car into a cargo tank truck using a portable pump, the bolt that retracts a self closing valve sheered, causing the valve to open slightly, and allowing liquid through the valve. The cap at the end of the pressure relief valve was not properly seated, so liquid bypassed the cap and released onto the ground. Veolia personnel closed the valve to stop the release and conducted spill cleanup in-house.

item.title: Report X-2023061596
item.description:
Report X-2023061596

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-22T00:38:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-22
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Fully Regulated package came to QA soiled due to one of the caps on the NON REGULATED part B bottles coming loose and allowing liquid to leak. The CORROSIVE part A bottles were both undamaged. DescribePack: A loose cap on the bottle allowed liquid to leak. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in tote and brought to QA for inspection.
